summary: An ordinance providing for the payment of the cost and expense of the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of Forty-second Avenue Southwest from West Stevens Street to West Hanford Street and of West Hanford Street from Forty-second Avenue Southwest to Thirty-ninth Avenue Southwest, all as provided for and specified in Ordinance No. 37632, of said city, by the issuance and sale of the bonds of the district to pay therefor.
